name: Bird and Beans for Playdate
description:
In Bird and Beans, you play as a small bird named Pyoro trying to eat seeds from the sky before they destroy the platform you are standing on. This is a faithful port/remake of the original game, which was a launch title for the Nintendo DSi, originally released outside of Japan in 2009.  The DSiWare original itself is also a port of the mini-game "Pyoro" from the first WarioWare title on the Gameboy Advance. 

I do not own the original music or gameplay, as those are all copyrighted by Nintendo. I developed this remake purely for fun to learn the Playdate SDK, and am not asking for any money. Instead, you can buy the original game on the 3DS eShop for $1.99 until the shop shuts down in March 2023. If there's enough interest, I may develop a spiritual successor to the game that avoids the use of copyrighted assets.

Features
  • All the classic Pyoro gameplay you know and love
  • 1-bit remakes of all the original sprites
  • Optional crank controls for Pyoro's tongue
  • Dynamic soundtrack
  • True-to-the-original tongue physics
  • High score tracking 
  • Verified to run great on device!
